titleStmt.title: The declaration and unanimous resolution of Colonel Whaley, and all the officers and souldiers of his regiment, now present with their cullors. With a particular list of all their names that signed it, on Munday the 14. of his instant May, 1649. Published to prevent mistakes, and presented to every honest heart, especially to our deare fellow souldiers of the Army under the command of our ever honored Generall Thomas Lord Fairfax, his Excellency.
titleStmt.author: Whalley, Edward, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Clowes, and are to be sold neer the Royall Exchange, and in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: P. 5-12 contain a list of signatories.
Thomason copy bound with items from May 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
